title: This is a POKEMON Gaming PC?!
description: A portion of this video was sponsored by Adobe Premiere Pro. Try it out now:  We teamed up with @Leonhart to build the ultimate Pokemon gaming PC!  My new podcast @TheBackmarkers!  Our second channel @thisis!  My Twitch channel:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
